title: Nanotechnology Laboratory Learning Design-Based Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering theories and basic laboratory operation experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based online learning environment for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can simulate the five-step nanotechnology laboratory safety protocol in a smartphone-based environment.
Learners can explain the virtual operation of digital multimeters and nanoscale measurement tools with 90% accuracy via real-time video lectures.
Learners can collaboratively design and submit a 3–5-page virtual lab report on nanomaterial property analysis using design-based research methods.

resources: Nanotechnology Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) Video Library
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
